label: ESCROWTYPE
description: This field stores a code defined by your financial institution in the Escrow Type parameters to indicate the type of funds being escrowed.

label: VENDORNUMBER
description: This field (from the Vendor record) stores the vendor identification that is used to pay recipients through the GL Posting batch program using the (2) Accounts Payable Posting option.

label: DISTRIBFREQUENCY
description: When an escrow disbursement is processed using the Daily Posting batch program, the value at this field is used to update the Next Distribution Date field.

label: DAY1
description: This field stores the day of the month (1–31) on which the first escrow payment is due for semi-monthly escrow payments or the day of the month on which all escrow payments are due for annual, semi-annual, quarterly, or monthly escrow payments.

label: DAY2
description: This field stores the day of the month (1–31) on which the second escrow payment is due for semi-monthly escrow payments. This field is not used for annual, semi-annual, quarterly, or monthly escrow payments.

label: NEXTDISTRIBDATE
description: This field contains the date of the next anticipated escrow distribution.

label: NEXTDISTRIBAMOUNT
description: This field stores the amount of the next distribution for an Escrow record.

label: INVOICENUMBER
description: This field stores the invoice number as it appears on the vendor's invoice. This field can contain any characters, including blanks.

label: PRINTDISTRIBNOTICE
description: This field indicates whether an escrow distribution notice should be printed each time funds relating to the Escrow record are disbursed.

label: FORCEDPLACEDINS
description: This field indicates whether the credit union has had to acquire an insurance policy for a mortgaged property. Force-placed insurance is necessary when the borrower fails to provide the required insurance protection.

label: PAYDIVIDEND
description: This field stores whether dividends are paid on the escrow type.

label: RECORDCHANGEDATE
description: Symitar Quest stores the system date in this field when you create, change, or save a record. There will be times when this field is updated because the record was saved, even though there may not be any actual changes in the record.

label: VENDORNAME
description: This field contains the name of the vendor from the Vendor record.

label: PAYMENTPORTION
description: This field contains the part of the total escrow payment for one mortgage loan that applies to the Escrow Type field value in the Escrow record.

label: SAVEDADJUSTPAYMENT
description: This field stores whether you have saved the value for the Adjust Payment Portion field from Escrow Type Parameters that was used during the last analysis.

label: EXPIRATIONDATE
description: This field stores the date the Escrow record expires. Symitar Quest uses this field to determine whether the Escrow record is included in escrow projections and escrow disbursements. See Escrow Analysis Calculations for a detailed explanation.

label: LASTDISTRIBDATE
description: This field stores the date of the last distribution made for the Escrow record. When new Loan Escrow records are created this field may remain blank.

label: LASTDISTRIBAMOUNT
description: This field stores the amount of the last distribution made for the Escrow record. When new Loan Escrow records are created this field may remain blank.

label: TRACKINGONLY
description: This field indicates whether you track items without collecting any escrow funds and without including the Loan Escrow record in escrow analysis.

label: FLOODINSTRACKING
description: This field enables you to track mortgage loans that require flood insurance

label: REALESTATEOWNER
description: This field stores the name or names of the owners of the real estate held as collateral. The owners may also be the borrowers, but occasionally property owned by one person is pledged to the mortgage loan of another.

label: TAXREFNUMBER
description: This field stores the real estate tax reference number or identification number issued by the taxing authority and used to help identify the real property being taxed.

label: PARCELNUMBER
description: This field stores the real estate parcel number issued by some taxing authorities that is used to help identify the real estate property being taxed.

label: LEGALDESCRIPTION
description: This field stores the legal description of the real estate.

label: POLICYOWNER
description: This field stores the name (or names) of the insurance policy owners.

label: POLICYNUMBER
description: This field stores the insurance policy number that the insurance premium is being paid on.

label: POLICYAMOUNT
description: This field stores the amount of the insurance policy.

label: POLICYORIGDATE
description: This field stores the date the insurance policy originated. This field must be populated with a date for the PMI notices and disclosures to function properly.

label: POLICYEXPIREDATE
description: This field stores the date the insurance policy expires.

label: PMIDISCLOSUREDATE
description: This field stores the date when the next annual PMI disclosure is to be generated for all residential mortgages.

label: PMICANCELNOTICE
description: This field indicates whether a PMI cancellation notice is generated for the corresponding loan.

label: PMICANCELDATE
description: This field stores the date PMI was canceled on the loan. This date is manually entered when the PMI is canceled.

label: PMITERMDATE
description: This field contains the date when the lender generally must terminate the PMI.

label: PMIMIDTERMDATE
description: This field stores the date the loan is halfway through the period between the first day of the amortization period and the ending when the mortgage is scheduled to be amortized.

label: PMIELIGNOTICES
description: This field stores the type of eligibility notice assigned to the corresponding loan.

label: LASTDISBURSFREQ
description: This field contains the value from the Distribution Frequency field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: LASTDISBURSEDAY1
description: This field stores the value from the Day 1 field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: LASTDISBURSEDAY2
description: This field stores the value from the Day 2 field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: LASTDISBURSDATE
description: This field contains the value copied from the Loan Escrow record Next Distribution Date field.

label: LASTDISBURSAMT
description: This field stores the value from the Next Distribution Amount field in the same Loan Escrow record if the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: LASTEXPIRATIONDATE
description: This field stores the value from the Expiration Date field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: LASTAMTNEEDEDPMT
description: This field contains the amount calculated based on the value of the Last Total Annual Disbursemnts field divided by the value at the Last Number Pmts Due in Period.

label: LASTNBRPMTSDUE
description: This field stores how many escrow payments are due, based on the value in the Current Payment Frequency field.

label: LASTTOTANNDISBURS
description: This field contains a value calculated by multiplying the Last Disbursement Amount in the Loan Escrow record by the frequency of the disbursement as defined by the Last Disbursement Frequency field.

label: LASTMONTHCUSHION
description: This field contains the cushion amount needed to offset any shortages for the last month of escrow.

label: LASTANALYSISCALC
description: If values in a Loan Escrow record are used during escrow analysis, this field stores the system date the analysis was run. This date is used when the last escrow analysis is being recreated.

label: PREVDISBURSFREQ
description: This field contains the value from the Last Disbursement Frequency field.

label: PREVDISBURSEDAY1
description: This field stores the value from the Last Disbursement Day 1 field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: PREVDISBURSEDAY2
description: This field stores the value from the Last Disbursement Day 2 field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: PREVDISBURSDATE
description: This field contains the value copied from the Loan Escrow record Last Disbursement Date field.

label: PREVDISBURSAMT
description: This field stores the amount from the Last Disbursement Amount field of the Loan Escrow record, during escrow analysis.

label: PREVEXPIRATIONDATE
description: This field stores the value from the Last Expiration Date field in the same Loan Escrow record when the Loan Escrow record is used in the escrow analysis.

label: PREVAMTNEEDEDPMT
description: This field stores the amount from the Last Amt Needed From Each Pmt field of the Loan Escrow record, during escrow analysis.

label: PREVNBRPMTSDUE
description: This field stores the previous number of escrow payments due, based on the value in the Last Number Pmts Due in Period field.

label: PREVTOTANNDISBURS
description: This field stores the amount from the Last Total Annual Disbursemnts field of the Loan Escrow record, during escrow analysis.

label: PREVMONTHCUSHION
description: This field stores the amount from the Last Month of Cushion field of the Loan Escrow record, during escrow analysis.

label: PREVANALYSISCALC
description: This field stores the amount from the Last Date Analysis Calculated field of the Loan Escrow record, during escrow analysis.

label: LOCATOR
description: Symitar Quest stores a unique number within each member account in this field that can be used as a unique identification of this record.
